message: Where do you usually get the background and icons for your app? Can you please share your resources here
I mean those icons for the UIButton

You can use Apple's glyphs, which are included in OS X as a font. Open the OS X character viewer, view Glyph, choose the font Apple symbols / Regular et voila. Note that this is accessible as Unicode as well, I can't remember where the map is located though... Best of luck!
Standard backgrounds are UIColors. There's one for the blue pinstripes, one for black linen, …
